events.name: West Ham United at Norwich City

headlines.description: West Ham's Michail Antonio scored four goals to consign Norwich City to relegation from the Premier League.
headlines.shortLinkText: Antonio scores four goals to relegate Norwich

headlines.description: Watford striker Troy Deeney eased his team's relegation fears with two second-half penalties as they beat Newcastle United 2-1 on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Deeney double eases Watford relegation fears

headlines.description: Liverpool's chances of setting a new Premier League points record were dented when they drew 1-1 against Burnley on Saturday.

video.headline: Liverpool's home record quest quelled by 'outstanding' Nick Pope

tracking.trackingName: Liverpool's home record quest quelled by 'outstanding' Nick Pope

headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool lose 100% home record with draw

headlines.description: Chelsea suffered a setback in their bid to stay in the top four with a 3-0 defeat at the hands of Sheffield United on Saturday.

video.headline: Nicol adamant Lampard's not at fault for Chelsea loss

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC EPL Analysis (Nicol adamant Lampard's not at fault for Chelsea loss) 2020/7/11 Global

headlines.shortLinkText: McGoldrick double dents Chelsea top four hopes

events.name: Manchester City at Brighton & Hove Albion

headlines.description: Raheem Sterling scored a hat trick as Manchester City battered Brighton 5-0 to pull 12 points ahead of third-placed Chelsea in the Premier League.

video.headline: Sterling's third goal 'shouldn't count' to his name

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC EPL FCTV (Sterling's third goal 'shouldn't count' to his name) 2020/7/11 Global

headlines.shortLinkText: Sterling hat trick as Man City batter Brighton
